alert.note: Alert for Mayaguez and Vicinity (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued April 27 at 11:13AM ADT until April 28 at 9:00AM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM AST THURSDAY... ...HIGH RIP CURRENT RISK NOW IN EFFECT THROUGH FRIDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...For the High Surf Advisory, large breaking waves of 10 to 15 feet. For the High Rip Current Risk, dangerous rip currents. * WHERE...Beaches of Aguada and Rincon. * WHEN...For the High Surf Advisory, until 8 AM AST Thursday. For the High Rip Current Risk, through Friday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Dangerous swimming and surfing conditions and localized beach erosion. Rip currents can sweep even the best swimmers away from shore into deeper water.
info.instruction: Inexperienced swimmers should remain out of the water due to dangerous surf conditions. Swim near a lifeguard. If caught in a rip current, relax and float. Don`t swim against the current. If able, swim in a direction following the shoreline. If unable to escape, face the shore and call or wave for help.
